Public MustInherit Class DbCommand Inherits Component Implements IDbCommand, IDisposable
public ref class DbCommand abstract : System::ComponentModel::Component, IDisposable, System::Data::IDbCommand

summary.span: 表示要對資料來源執行的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

summary.span: 提供代表命令之資料庫特有類別的基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for database-specific classes that represent commands.

summary.span: 建構 物件的執行個體。

span.span: Constructs an instance of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cancel() cil managed

summary.span: 嘗試取消 的執行。

span.span: Attempts to cancels the execution of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有要取消項目，會發生任何事。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens. 不過，如果正在進行命令，而取消作業的嘗試失敗，則不會產生任何例外狀況 (Exception)。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract string CommandText { get; set; }
Public MustOverride Property CommandText As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ CommandText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要對資料來源執行的文字命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the text command to run against the data source.

value.span: 要執行的文字命令。

span.span: The text command to execute.

value.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將至`StoredProcedure`，您應該設定預存程序名稱的屬性。When you set the to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the name of the stored procedure. 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫其中一個`Execute`方法。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the `Execute` methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract int CommandTimeout { get; set; }
Public MustOverride Property CommandTimeout As Integer
public: abstract property int CommandTimeout { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定結束執行命令的嘗試並產生錯誤之前的等待時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

value.span: 等待命令執行的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果就會產生受指派屬性值小於 0。An is generated if the assigned property value is less than 0. 請注意，實作者注意事項中,，建議您使用 0 表示無逾時。Note to implementers, it is recommended that 0 means no timeout.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 ExecuteNonQuery() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ExecuteNonQuery () As Integer

summary.span: 針對連接物件執行 SQL 陳述式。

span.span: Executes a SQL statement against a connection object.
The number of rows affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用來執行資料庫目錄作業 （例如，查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表），或執行 UPDATE、 INSERT 或 DELETE 陳述式來變更資料庫中的資料。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables), or to change the data in a database by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 雖然不傳回任何資料列、 任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會以資料填入。Although does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

summary.span: 這個方法會實作非同步版本的 ，但會同步傳回 ，封鎖呼叫的執行緒。

span.span: This method implements the asynchronous version of , but returns a synchronously, blocking the calling thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ExecuteScalar () As Object

summary.span: 執行查詢，並傳回查詢所傳回的結果集中第一個資料列的第一個資料行。

span.span: Executes the query and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: 會忽略所有其他的資料行和資料列。

span.span: All other columns and rows are ignored.

returns.span: 結果集中第一個資料列的第一個資料行。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來從資料庫擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 這需要較少的程式碼比使用方法與執行以產生單一值使用所傳回的資料所需的作業。This requires less code than using the method and performing the operations necessary to generate the single value using the data returned by a . 如果結果集中的第一個資料列的第一個資料行沒有找到，則為 null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 會傳回。If the first column of the first row in the result set is not found, a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned. 如果資料庫中的值是`null`，此查詢會傳回`DBNull.Value`。If the value in the database is `null`, the query returns `DBNull.Value`.

summary.span: 實作非同步版本的 ，但會同步傳回 ，封鎖呼叫的執行緒。

summary.span: 提供者應該覆寫為適當的實作。

span.span: Providers should override with an appropriate implementation.

summary.span: 可以選擇性地接受忽略語彙基元。

span.span: The cancellation token may optionally be ignored.

summary.span: 預設實作會叫用同步方法，並傳回完成的工作，封鎖呼叫的執行緒。

span.span: The default implementation invokes the synchronous method and returns a completed task, blocking the calling thread.

summary.span: 如果傳遞一個已經被取消的取消語彙基元，預設實作會傳回已取消的工作。

span.span: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellation token.

summary.span: ExecuteScalar 擲回的例外狀況會透過傳回的工作例外狀況屬性來傳送。

span.span: Exceptions thrown by ExecuteScalar will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.

summary.span: 在傳回的工作完成之前，不叫用 物件的其他方法及屬性。

span.span: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the object until the returned Task is complete.

returns.span: 表示非同步作業的工作。

span.span: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md).

exception.span: 執行命令文字時發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred while executing the command text.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed

summary.span: 在資料來源上建立命令已備妥 (或已編譯) 的版本。

span.span: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`TableDirect`，`Prepare`不做任何動作。If the property is set to `TableDirect`, `Prepare` does nothing. 如果設`StoredProcedure`，呼叫`Prepare`應該會成功，但它可能會不導致任何作業。If is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to `Prepare` should succeed, although it may result in a no-op.
